description: Try our easy to follow Breakfast Berry Smoothies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Smoothie & frapp√©,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Blueberry,Tree nut free,Egg free,Raspberry,Sesame free,Father's Day,Strawberry,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Breakfast Berry Smoothies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g strawberries, hulled, halved, plus extra to serve
0.66 cup rolled oats, plus extra to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients, except extra berries and extra oats, in a blender and blend on high speed for 2 minutes or until well combined and thick. Pour into glasses and garnish with extra berries and oats. Serve immediately.
